Title: Gangliosides for the treatment of diabetic peripheral neuropathy
Abstract: © 2017 The Cochrane Collaboration. Published by John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To assess the benefits and harms of treatment with gangliosides in diabetic peripheral neuropathy.
